i18n.title: Perform an Interactive Rebase
i18n.description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to manage their codebase efficiently. One of the most useful features of Git is interactive rebase, which allows developers to modify the commit history of a branch. In this challenge, you will learn how to perform an interactive rebase using Git.

meta.title: Mastering Git Interactive Rebase
meta.description: Unlock the power of Git's interactive rebase feature to streamline your commit history and optimize your development workflow.
meta.keywords: version control, development workflow, git labs, git, commit history, interactive rebase, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful interaction
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 执行交互式变基
i18n.description: Git是一个强大的版本控制系统，它允许开发者高效地管理他们的代码库。Git最有用的特性之一是交互式变基，它允许开发者修改分支的提交历史。在这个挑战中，你将学习如何使用Git执行交互式变基。

meta.title: 掌握Git交互式变基
meta.description: 释放Git交互式变基功能的强大力量，简化你的提交历史并优化你的开发工作流程。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, 开发工作流程, Git实验室, Git, 提交历史, 交互式变基, Git游乐场

verify.name: 验证交互是否成功
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
